sentences.en: Belushi imitates a giant pimple by squeezing his cheeks and spewing chewed food out of his mouth.
sentences.cn: 我们在等候某个毕业生领文凭的同时，可以欣赏像《动物屋》这样与学校有关的经典电影的片断：约翰-贝鲁西模仿一个脸上长满丘疹的巨人，双手挤着脸，从嘴里喷出嚼过的东西。

sentences.en: Brother to recommend us a good noodle pimple!
sentences.cn: 老弟向我们推荐面疙瘩不错!

sentences.en: Can care the pimple, pimple and have the decontamination, effect that eliminate inflammation.
sentences.cn: 可治疗暗疮 、 粉刺,具有净化 、 消炎的功效.

sentences.en: Even those of us who are well past adolescence can get the pimple.
sentences.cn: 就算我们过了青春期,我们中的一部分人仍然会长粉刺.

sentences.en: He was a twinkling - eyed, pimple - faced man, with his hair standing upright all over his head.
sentences.cn: 他这个人,两只眼直眨巴, 满脸都是粉刺儿, 满头的头发都直挺挺地扎撒着.

sentences.en: I applied some pimple cream on the big zit on my face.
sentences.cn: 我在脸上的大痘痘上涂了些痘痘药膏.

sentences.en: Pimple products in the pipeline combine several medicines to make regimens easier on the patient.
sentences.cn: 治疗丘疹的产品和其他药物一起使用可以使患者的疗法更加简单.

sentences.en: Sometimes, it is better to remain unknown than to make pimple hate you.
sentences.cn: 有时候, 默默无闻比让人反感更好.

sentences.en: The pimple came to a head before bursting.
sentences.cn: 丘疹长成脓包后才破裂.

sentences.en: The toothpaste dehydrates the pimple and absorbs the oil.
sentences.cn: 牙膏可以让粉刺脱水,并吸收油份.

words.tran_cn: 肿泡的；有丘疹的；有疙瘩的

trans.tran_en: a small raised red spot on your skin, especially on your face
